heading: Let all things praise the Lord: men and angels, the heavenly bodies, the elements and the earth, and all things thereon.
verses: from the heavens: praise him in the heights.
Praise ye him, all his angels: praise ye him, all his hosts.
Praise ye him, sun and moon: praise him, all ye stars of light.
Praise him, ye heavens of heavens, and ye
